about_the_game:
"Jack in!! MegaMan, Execute sweet tunes!" Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection's music gets supercharged!

This soundtrack contains 22 diverse tracks featuring new arrangements of classic Mega Man Battle Network tunes originally composed by Akari Kaida, Yoshino Aoki, and Toshihiko Horiyama.

Arrangement styles include pop rock, piano, big band, R&B, dance, lo-fi hip hop, rock, and kawaii future bass.
